article:
One's attitude is always important. If you are lazy and weak, you will never taste success. But if you are  _ , success and happiness will be more likely to come to you.
I love eating persimmons   . But you can't get them until autumn. If you try them before the right time, they probably _  bad. In Grade Six, because of my poor grades, my parents were _ that I wouldn't be able to get into an excellent middle school. They _ me to study harder, but I didn't really understand why they were so anxious .
Summer came and I studied hard. The hot weather made me sleepy and I couldn't concentrate   on my textbook. But every time when I wanted to stop  _ , my dad would say, "Think about your   _ . If you don't work hard, you will regret." I had to sit back down again and return to my textbooks. But all I thought about was playing with my friends.
My dad would say to me, with a serious look on _ face, "If a persimmon tree doesn't grow in summer, it can't bear   fruit in autumn! Only by working hard can you get good results." A few months later, I succeeded in _ the key middle school. I was so happy. My dad was right, if a persimmon tree doesn't grow _ summer, there will be no fruit in autumn. I worked hard and I enjoyed the fruit of my hard work!
